title: Ice Heart
tagline: in which the Dunmar Fellowship battles an ice maiden
summary: Hralgar shares stories of Drankorian Empire's history, Apollyon, and skyship Vindristjarna.
Hralgar gifts the Fellowship a wind blessing for swift travel and Kenzo a fragment of storm giant ki.
The party reaches Hralgar's ruined palace in the mountains and encounters an ice maiden.
After an attempt at negotiation, the party engages in battle and defeats the ice maiden and her icy heart.
short_summary: The Dunmar Fellowship learns of Taelgar's past, receives a wind blessing from Hralgar, and defeats an ice maiden at his ruined palace.
